metadata.title: CVE-2019-13762 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in downloads in Google Chrome on Windowsprior to 79.0.3945.79 allowed a local attacker to spoof downloaded filesvia local code.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
